name: Infinite Maze Runner Shooter Prototype
description:
a prototype in which you run and shoot "zombies" in an procedurally generated maze.

the idea is to add various poweups, themes, character etc. to provide a varity of play styles and customiziblity. 

i am currenty using free assets from unity. and i am currently lerning blender to make 3D models form my game.

Controls:

on the start screen use fire button to select players if you are not satisfied with player order then use select to reset player order this can only be done by player one.

to start the game use the Start Button.

to pause the game use the Start Button. 

to restart the game use the Start Button then press the select button. 

you can figure the rest out for yourselfs.

Control Sets:

Esc as the Start Button,R for Select Button, WASD for Movement , Left Ctrl as FireButton.

Or

Enter as Start Button,R for Select Button, Arrow Keys for Movement, Right Ctrl for Fire Button.

Or

Start Button as Start Button,Select Button for Select Button, Analog Sticks or DPAD for movement, A button for Fire.
